data.title: Charles Bender Endorses Robert Weinroth for Congress – Robert S. Weinroth For Congress
data.text:
Charles Bender Endorses Robert Weinroth for Congress

Boca Raton, FL– Charles Bender has announced his endorsement of Robert Weinroth for Florida’s 23rd Congressional District against Democrat Jared Moskowitz.

“South Florida needs a servant leader fighting for us in Congress and I can’t think of anyone more befitting to that role than Robert Weinroth,” said Charles Bender. “I’ve known him for years. More importantly, I know his heart. This is a man who cares about people and that’s why we need him in Washington.”

Weinroth responded: “Charles has done so much to improve the lives in this community. I am humbled by his leadership and support. If elected, I promise to live up to the praise he has bestowed upon me.”

About Charles Bender:

Charles is the Founding CEO of Place of Hope, a faith-based and state-licensed family-style residential child-caring agency for abused and neglected children, located in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida.

About Robert Weinroth:

Robert Weinroth is a more than 30-year resident of South Florida where he has served as an executive and general counsel in the insurance, finance, and healthcare industries. Robert is also the former Mayor of Palm Beach County and served on the Boca Raton City Council. Robert and his wife, Pamela, live in Boca Raton. Robert is a Republican running for the Florida 23rd Congressional District, currently held by Democrat Jared Moskowitz.

To learn more, please visit www.RobertForCongress.com

###
